title: Ten reasons why either Trump or Harris might win
content: Polls suggest the race is deadlocked - but if one candidate pulls away, these factors could explain why.
summary: Polls suggest the race is deadlocked - but if one candidate pulls away, these factors could explain why.

title: Spain rescuers search underground parking as fresh flooding hits Barcelona

title: Lightning kills 13 children at Uganda refugee camp
content: The children were attending a church service when the lightning struck, police say.

title: At least 10 dead after volcano erupts in Indonesia
